title: Poster: FlexDP-Flexible Data Plane for ENFV
abstract: We design a flexible data plane to integrate SDN and ENFV to manage complex network services for future mobile services. We build our prototype and show its feasibility in terms of latency and throughput by using mobile edge computing as an example use case in a realistic mobile networking testbed.
booktitle: The 25th Annual International Conference on Mobile Computing and Networking
